decision_conditions: The submitted Travel Plan Statement does not include details of baseline surveys to be undertaken, measurable targets to be achieved, a monitoring programme, an action plan to deliver the measures and does not identify a Travel Plan Coordinator.  The submitted Travel Plan Statement is therefore not considered to adequately promote sustainable forms of transport, contrary to policy T4 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS6 and DM8 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by condition 12 (School Travel Plan) of permission  22/01687/CREG3 (Erection of standalone modular building comprising of 4no. classrooms, 2no. WCs, Reception, Common Room, and associated circulation, removal and replacement of existing timber pedestrian gate and external steps with new metal framed gate and new metal external steps, new access control intercom and external light, landscaping works and erection of 1.8m separating fence)
